message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, since I'm making the first offer. We can adjust in the next rounds if you'd like.
Let's try a bit more in my favor this time, considering the inflation hits you harder.
Let's call it a draw this time. 50/50 is fair considering the inflation, and it gives us both a chance to see how the rest of the game plays out.
